strategic_overview.purpose: Enable suppliers to register their companies, submit documentation, and track onboarding approval status.
business_value: Reduces manual effort in supplier onboarding
Ensures all documents are submitted before first transaction
Enables procurement to monitor risk and compliance

mvp_components.app_details: A portal for suppliers to register their companies and upload necessary documentation.

app_screens.screen_details: Allows suppliers to input company details and submit for registration.
Enables suppliers to upload, version-track, and manage their documents.

mvp_components.flow_details: Automates the process of supplier onboarding, including email notifications and approval workflows.

flow_actions.action_details: Sends email notifications to suppliers when their registration is incomplete.
Routes supplier registrations through the necessary departments for approval.

actions.action_0001: Send an email notification to the supplier if registration is incomplete
actions.action_0002: Start an approval process for the supplier registration

connectors.Approvals: Create and wait for an approval

mvp_components.trigger: When an item is created or modified in SharePoint

post_mvp_modules.details: Provides real-time status updates to suppliers about their onboarding process.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: This should be a CanvasApp screen to allow for real-time updates and notifications within the Supplier Registration Portal.

post_mvp_modules.details: Automatically assigns supplier numbers from the ERP system after successful registration.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Extend the existing PowerAutomate flow to include an action that integrates with the ERP system for supplier number assignment.

post_mvp_modules.details: Allows the registration form and document upload features to support multiple languages.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Implement multilingual support within the PowerPages application to cater to a diverse supplier base.

constraints: Uploaded documents must be retained for 5 years
Supplier visibility must be scoped to their own company data only

tables.description: Table to store approval processes for suppliers

database_model.notes: The Suppliers table is the central table with one-to-many relationships with the Documents and Approvals tables. Each supplier can upload multiple documents and go through multiple approval processes. Normalization is applied to reduce data redundancy and improve data integrity.
